name: Little Errands
description:
A short, easy-going game where you play as Aubergine, a purple rabbit, as they run errands for their sister Cauliflower. Gather the ingredients for all three recipes to have a nice autumn-themed lunch with your friends. 

(Bonus: Find all three secret notes to unlock the secret ending!)

Created for the Cozy Autumn Game Jam (2022).

🎵 Song: 'Barradeen - Bedtime After A Coffee' is under a creative commons license license.

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfTggY6U7d6XVre774B1_qg
